conbody.p: The Enquiry model file describes a search against the T24 database, by setting criteria and returned columns. It is a report designer which allows you to create user defined reports that fetch and present data.

Enquiries can be
invoked in T24 based on the context - Context enquiries,
used to populate a dropdown field with values,
launched from an enquiry - Drill down enquiries and
launched from the T24 Menu or Command line.
